request.description:
This endpoint allows you to create a new role by sending an HTTP POST request to the specified URL. The request should include a JSON payload in the raw request body with the "name" parameter to specify the name of the role to be created.

### Request Body

- name (string, required): The name of the role to be created.
    

### Response

The response will include the details of the newly created role, including its unique identifier, name, and any other relevant information.
